name: 施青良
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
2/19	Introduction
2/26	Unit 1-2
3/5	Unit 3-4
3/12	Unit 5; Unit 12
3/19	Unit 6; Unit 13
3/26	Unit 8-9
4/2	Unit 10-11
4/9	Unit 7; Unit 14
4/16	Practice Test One
4/23	Unit 15-16
4/30	Unit 17-18
5/7	Unit 19; Unit 26
5/14	Unit 20; Unit 27
5/21	Unit 22-23
5/28	No Class
6/4	Unit 24-25
6/11  	Unit 21; Unit 28
6/18  	Practice Test Two
scorePolicy:
Practice Test  50%
Assignment and In-class activity 35%
Attendance 15%
materials: Trew, Grant. Tactics for TOEIC. Listening and Reading Test. Oxford: Oxford UP, 2007.
